title: Inter High School Tournaments? Thoughts
body: Since a high amount of high schoolers play, would it be a good idea to make some kind of tournament between schools?  Maybe something like the University Championships?Thoughts?

replies.body:
Hi, 
I take it you haven't seen our group (www.facebook.com/OCESSLoLT)before? We specialise in high school tournaments and this is our second year running split long tournaments throughout the year. Shoot us a message or come and say hi! :)
